author: swertz
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of #40209, see description there

#### PR validation:

Same as #40209

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport needed for nanoAODv11 production in 12_6_X.
title: [12_6_X] Nano: restore Run2/3 consistency between electron/photon IDs; remove scale+smearing correction for Run3
